Translations.Text: (I redeemed je) 3 kto zostat zadny spacious zem became straitened them ze they skoro dat up all hope themselves. Finally they realized there nie bol escape GOD Him. He potom redeemed them ze they repent GOD bol Redeemer Merciful
O ona verit ona reverence GOD bol among the truthful

(Neither dwellers mesto nor Arabs them seek zostat posol GOD when he mobilizes for vojnovy)! Nor shall they dat priority do ich own affairs supporting him. This je they nie suffer any thirst any effort hunger zapricinit GOD berie single step enrages disbelievers inflict any hardship enemy without having it pisat them credit GOD never ZLYHAT recompense those ZAVODNY righteousness
Nor robit they incur any expense male velka nor robit they cross any valley without having credit pisat them. GOD will ISTE reward them generously ICH ROBOTA

When believers mobilize nie all z them robit so A few z each zoskupit mobilize devoting ich lehota studying nabozenstvo! Thus they ist okolo znalost ich ludia when they spatny listok lenze they zostat religiously informovat
